CustomField.formula: CASE(Status, "Closed", "Status: Closed","Rejected", "Status: Rejected","New", "Status: New", "On Hold", "Status: On Hold (until " + TEXT( stopped_until__c) + ")","In Progress", "Status: In Progress", "")+ BR()+ CASE(Category__c,"Product Reviews","Category: Product Reviews","Shop Reviews","Category: Shop Reviews","")+ BR()+ CASE(Sub_Category__c,"Import","Sub category: Import","")
CustomField.label: Status and categories
